text: pro zhyttya nynishnye ta nastupne! Zapytuyutʹ tebe i pro syrit. Skazhy: «Robyty yim dobro — blaho. A yakshcho vy poyednayete svoyi ta yikhni spravy, to vony — vashi braty». Ta Allah vidriznyaye nechestyvoho vid dobrochynnoho. Yakby Allah pobazhav, to utrudnyv by stanovyshche vashe. Allah — Velykyy, Mudryy
